Facebook use to be good, but the owners and team have become politically motivated to remove content that is against their investors, they will give you fake reasons for why your post was removed, but they don‚Äôt remove hate comments.

title: Weird things happen
text:
Here‚Äôs a few weird things that happen on the FB app over and over and over and over again‚Ä¶
1. Notifications just disappear!! ??? One minute  you see them and right before your very eyes they just disappear before you can click on them. What the heck for? This happens sporadically but at least every other day!
2. When you join a group, you can click on your profile photo while in that group and see everything that you posted since day one in that group. Now, for the past 3-4 months, all my postings have been duplicated and triplicated, so when I want to look back and see, for instance, how I described a certain doll in a prior posting, I have to scroll thru multiple images of the same postings just to get to the one I‚Äôm looking for. This can take up a lot of unnecessary scrolling! Totally ridiculous!
3. A firewall preventing scammers just doesn‚Äôt exist on the billion dollar making FB company app. I‚Äôve been kicked outta groups because scammers have posted crooked posts to some of my groups that make it look like I‚Äôm sending them!

title: Great App!
text:
Facebook keeps me connected to my family and friends! It also helps me to get information out about my business and promotes the safety of the country! Facebook is a wonderful tool to use and positive uplifting and empowering ways! When used as a marketing tool, and a tool to create, Facebook can definitely be top-tier! I thank Facebook for the abilities to stay connected, informed, and engaged with the city, schools, and resources available, when properly searched and used correctly!

Just like any other app, it needs to be updated and stay current, but I think it‚Äôs an all-around great app!

title: Privacy? I don‚Äôt think so.
text: The app does everything in its power to stay running or signed in at all times. It is easy to mis-tap ‚ÄúSave password‚Äù. When really you never would do that with a social media application. We need those ‚Äústay here!‚Äù options to not be so engrossed in this faulty product(glitches CONSTANTLY). Meta products in general. Bad security(allowing the ex-president who caused a riot, back on all platforms) and privacy measures for individuals. Download and delete. Don't waste your energy warding off the spam you'll get.
